doc.title: Tokyo Eats Part 2: Tonkatsu Tenshin: Where the locals go for Tonkatsu in Meguro
doc.text: For/IN Tonkatsu/NN ,/, we/PRP made/VBD our/JJ way/NN off/IN the/DT tourist/NN route/NN to/TO the/DT town/NN of/IN Meguro/NN where/WRB there/EX is/VBZ a/DT famous/JJ Tonkatsu/NN restaurant/NN called/VBD Tonkin/NN ./.
